My Skills

My Core Languages

JavaScript and Python are the main languages I have worked with. I also know html, css and sass. I especially like css for making all kinds of graphics. In the future I would like to learn more about React.

Desing Experience

I have experience on design. I worked as a layout designer for a newspaper. Worked also on summer festival making posters and leaflets. I love animations in css and adding interactivity on the page. Also I’m very intrested in UX and UI.
